parts.text:
[
  {
    "id": "window_title_bar",
    "type": "window_title_bar",
    "text": "Sem título 1 — LibreOffice Writer",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "application_name": "LibreOffice Writer",
      "document_name": "Sem título 1"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "window_minimize_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Minimizar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "window_maximize_restore_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Maximizar/Restaurar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "window_close_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Fechar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_arquivo",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Arquivo",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_editar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Editar",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_exibir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Exibir",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_inserir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Inserir",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formatar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formatar",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_estilos",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Estilos",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_tabela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Tabela",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formulario",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formulário",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ferramentas",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ferramentas",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_janela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Janela",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ajuda",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ajuda",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_new_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Novo",
    "icon": "document",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_open_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Abrir",
    "icon": "folder_open",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_save_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Salvar",
    "icon": "save",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_print_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Imprimir",
    "icon": "print",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_print_preview",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Visualizar impressão",
    "icon": "print_preview",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_cut",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Recortar",
    "icon": "cut",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_copy",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Copiar",
    "icon": "copy",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_paste",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Colar",
    "icon": "paste",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_undo",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Desfazer",
    "icon": "undo",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_redo",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Refazer",
    "icon": "redo",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_find_replace",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Localizar e substituir",
    "icon": "search",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_style_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Título do documento",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Título do documento"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_name_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Liberation Sans",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Liberation Sans"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_size_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "28 pt",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "28 pt"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_bold_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Negrito",
    "icon": "bold",
    "state": "selected",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_italic_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Itálico",
    "icon": "italic",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_underline_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sublinhado",
    "icon": "underline",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_strikethrough_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Tachado",
    "icon": "strikethrough",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_color_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor da fonte",
    "icon": "font_color",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_highlight_color_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor do destaque",
    "icon": "highlight_color",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_left",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à esquerda",
    "icon": "align_left",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_center",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Centralizar",
    "icon": "align_center",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_right",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à direita",
    "icon": "align_right",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_justify",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Justificar",
    "icon": "justify",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_line_spacing",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha",
    "icon": "line_spacing",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_numbered_list",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Lista numerada",
    "icon": "numbered_list",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_bullet_list",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Lista com marcadores",
    "icon": "bullet_list",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_decrease_indent",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Diminuir recuo",
    "icon": "decrease_indent",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_increase_indent",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Aumentar recuo",
    "icon": "increase_indent",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_insert_image",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Inserir imagem",
    "icon": "image",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_insert_table",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Inserir tabela",
    "icon": "table",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_insert_chart",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Inserir gráfico",
    "icon": "chart",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_insert_hyperlink",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Inserir hiperlink",
    "icon": "link",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_show_draw_functions",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Mostrar funções de desenho",
    "icon": "draw",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_show_track_changes",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Mostrar controle de alterações",
    "icon": "track_changes",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_more_buttons",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Mais botões",
    "icon": "arrow_right",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "horizontal_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "region": "main-content",
    "meta": {
      "orientation": "horizontal"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "document_editing_area",
    "type": "text_area",
    "text": "Título do Documento",
    "region": "main-content",
    "state": "focused",
    "meta": {
      "cursor_position": "end_of_text"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_panel",
    "type": "panel",
    "text": "Propriedades",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_close_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Fechar painel Propriedades",
    "icon": "close",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_help_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Ajuda",
    "icon": "help",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_menu_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Menu",
    "icon": "menu",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_estilo",
    "type": "collapsible_section",
    "text": "Estilo",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_estilo_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Título do documento",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Título do documento"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_estilo_update_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Atualizar estilo selecionado",
    "icon": "refresh",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_caractere",
    "type": "collapsible_section",
    "text": "Caractere",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_font_name_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Liberation Sans",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Liberation Sans"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_font_size_input",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "28 pt",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange", "onBlur"],
    "meta": {
      "input_type": "text",
      "unit": "pt",
      "current_value": "28"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_bold_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Negrito",
    "icon": "bold",
    "state": "selected",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_italic_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Itálico",
    "icon": "italic",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_underline_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sublinhado",
    "icon": "underline",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_strikethrough_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Tachado",
    "icon": "strikethrough",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_font_color_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor da fonte",
    "icon": "font_color",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_superscript_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sobrescrito",
    "icon": "superscript",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_subscript_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Subscrito",
    "icon": "subscript",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_shadow_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sombra",
    "icon": "shadow",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_outline_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Contorno",
    "icon": "outline",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_increase_font_size_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Aumentar tamanho da fonte",
    "icon": "increase_font_size",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_decrease_font_size_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Diminuir tamanho da fonte",
    "icon": "decrease_font_size",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_caractere_clear_direct_formatting_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Limpar formatação direta",
    "icon": "clear_formatting",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_paragrafo",
    "type": "collapsible_section",
    "text": "Parágrafo",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_align_left",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à esquerda",
    "icon": "align_left",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_align_center",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Centralizar",
    "icon": "align_center",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_align_right",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à direita",
    "icon": "align_right",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_justify",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Justificar",
    "icon": "justify",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_background_color",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor de fundo",
    "icon": "background_color",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_line_spacing_1",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha 1",
    "icon": "line_spacing_1",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_line_spacing_1_5",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha 1.5",
    "icon": "line_spacing_1_5",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_line_spacing_2",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha 2",
    "icon": "line_spacing_2",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_spacing_above_input",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,42 cm",
    "label": "Espaço acima",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange", "onBlur"],
    "meta": {
      "input_type": "text",
      "unit": "cm",
      "current_value": "0,42"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_spacing_below_input",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,21 cm",
    "label": "Espaço abaixo",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange", "onBlur"],
    "meta": {
      "input_type": "text",
      "unit": "cm",
      "current_value": "0,21"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_indent_before_text_input",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "label": "Recuo antes do texto",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange", "onBlur"],
    "meta": {
      "input_type": "text",
      "unit": "cm",
      "current_value": "0,00"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_indent_after_text_input",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "label": "Recuo depois do texto",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange", "onBlur"],
    "meta": {
      "input_type": "text",
      "unit": "cm",
      "current_value": "0,00"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragrafo_first_line_indent_input",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "label": "Recuo da primeira linha",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange", "onBlur"],
    "meta": {
      "input_type": "text",
      "unit": "cm",
      "current_value": "0,00"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_properties",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "properties",
    "state": "selected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_page",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "page",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_gallery",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "gallery",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_navigator",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "navigator",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_styles",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "styles",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_gallery_images",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "images",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_functions",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "functions",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_manage_changes",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "manage_changes",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_zoom",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "icon": "zoom",
    "state": "unselected",
    "region": "sidebar-tabs",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_page_info",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Página 1 de 1",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_word_count",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "3 palavras, 19 caracteres",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_style",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Estilo de página Padrão",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_language",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Português (Brasil)",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_slider",
    "type": "slider",
    "text": "Zoom",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_out_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Diminuir zoom",
    "icon": "zoom_out",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_in_button",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Aumentar zoom",
    "icon": "zoom_in",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  }
]
